title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Signal Mountain, Tennessee
content:
Photo submitted by Rich McAfee, “… the trails on Signal Mountain near Chattanooga. It was an amazing day exploring mountain bike trails on my gravel bike.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day.
